title: Where is the SPECTATE MATCH section
body:
You can click on this pic and understand what I mean.


https://i.gyazo.com/bf2a3cebba848502b589a782c9b75f53.png


There used to be a place where we can watch pro-players play in the bottom-right section where the Aurelion Sol bio is there now. Is there still a way we can view the matches or has it been removed?

replies.body:
I'm going to assume this is only temporary as im still able to pull down a list of featured games through the Riot Games API, they probably just needed the space to feature other things for now.

For reference, the api call used can be found here https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/977/3337
